verbose_text: The patients were divided into three main subsets based on their connexin expression : i) the first cluster consisted of 18 patients with a generally low expression of all connexins (upper section of heatmap); ii) the second cluster (11 patients, middle section of heatmap) showed intermediate levels of Cx43 and Cx45; and iii) the third cluster (9 patients, lower section of heatmap) showed generally higher connexin levels, particularly for Cx43 and Cx45.
